00005 MultiBodyTree::InitCache::InitCache() {
00006         m_inertias.resize(0);
00007         m_joints.resize(0);
00008         m_num_dofs = 0;
00009         m_root_index=-1;
00010 }
00011 
00012 int MultiBodyTree::InitCache::addBody(const int body_index, const int parent_index,
00013                                                                           const JointType joint_type,
00014                                                                           const vec3& parent_r_parent_body_ref,
00015                                                                           const mat33& body_T_parent_ref,
00016                                                                           const vec3& body_axis_of_motion, const idScalar mass,
00017                                                                           const vec3& body_r_body_com, const mat33& body_I_body,
00018                                                                           const int user_int, void* user_ptr) {
00019         switch (joint_type) {
00020                 case REVOLUTE:
00021                 case PRISMATIC:
00022                         m_num_dofs += 1;
00023                         break;
00024                 case FIXED:
00025                         // does not add a degree of freedom
00026                         // m_num_dofs+=0;
00027                         break;
00028                 case FLOATING:
00029                         m_num_dofs += 6;
00030                         break;
00031                 default:
00032                         error_message("unknown joint type %d\n", joint_type);
00033                         return -1;
00034         }
00035 
00036         if(-1 == parent_index) {
00037                 if(m_root_index>=0) {
00038                         error_message("trying to add body %d as root, but already added %d as root body\n",
00039                                                   body_index, m_root_index);
00040                         return -1;
00041                 }
00042                 m_root_index=body_index;
00043         }
00044 
00045         JointData joint;
00046         joint.m_child = body_index;
00047         joint.m_parent = parent_index;
00048         joint.m_type = joint_type;
00049         joint.m_parent_pos_parent_child_ref = parent_r_parent_body_ref;
00050         joint.m_child_T_parent_ref = body_T_parent_ref;
00051         joint.m_child_axis_of_motion = body_axis_of_motion;
00052 
00053         InertiaData body;
00054         body.m_mass = mass;
00055         body.m_body_pos_body_com = body_r_body_com;
00056         body.m_body_I_body = body_I_body;
00057 
00058         m_inertias.push_back(body);
00059         m_joints.push_back(joint);
00060         m_user_int.push_back(user_int);
00061         m_user_ptr.push_back(user_ptr);
00062         return 0;
00063 }
00064 int MultiBodyTree::InitCache::getInertiaData(const int index, InertiaData* inertia) const {
00065         if (index < 0 || index > static_cast<int>(m_inertias.size())) {
00066                 error_message("index out of range\n");
00067                 return -1;
00068         }
00069 
00070         *inertia = m_inertias[index];
00071         return 0;
00072 }
00073

00075         if (index < 0 || index > static_cast<int>(m_user_int.size())) {
00076                 error_message("index out of range\n");

00084         if (index < 0 || index > static_cast<int>(m_user_ptr.size())) {

00092 int MultiBodyTree::InitCache::getJointData(const int index, JointData* joint) const {
00093         if (index < 0 || index > static_cast<int>(m_joints.size())) {
00094                 error_message("index out of range\n");
00095                 return -1;
00096         }
00097         *joint = m_joints[index];
00098         return 0;
00099 }

00101 int MultiBodyTree::InitCache::buildIndexSets() {
00102         // NOTE: This function assumes that proper indices were provided
00103         //         User2InternalIndex from utils can be used to facilitate this.
00104 
00105         m_parent_index.resize(numBodies());
00106         for (idArrayIdx j = 0; j < m_joints.size(); j++) {
00107                 const JointData& joint = m_joints[j];
00108                 m_parent_index[joint.m_child] = joint.m_parent;
00109         }
00110 
00111         return 0;
00112 }
